movies.title: Cellisten
movies.plot: After attending a concert by Russian cellist Irina Konsalevska Wallander saves her life when she is the victim of a car bomb. She recovers in hospital where another attempt is made to kill her. Wallander finds out she is to give evidence against hit-man Yuri Rina,who shot dead her boyfriend Mischa and that the Russian Mafia are out to silence her. Mischa smuggled drugs in her cello case unbeknown to her but forensics reveal an unexpected link between victim and killer,giving the reason for the murder as personal. Irina is moved to a houseboat where she proves her worth in a gun battle between the police and her pursuers.
movies.simplePlot: After attending a concert by Russian cellist Irina Konsalevska Wallander saves her life when she is the victim of a car bomb. She recovers in hospital where another attempt is made to kill ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Lena Endre was born on July 8, 1955 in Härnösand, Västernorrlands län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009). She was previously married to Richard Hobert, Thomas Hanzon, Vjeko Benzon and Malte Ekblom.
biography.name: Lena Endre

biography.bio: Sverrir Gudnason was born on September 12, 1978. He is an actor, known for Valse pour Monica (2013), Gentlemen (2014) and Blowfly Park (2014).
biography.name: Sverrir Gudnason

biography.bio: Nina Zanjani was born on September 1, 1981 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mind the Gap (2007), Balls (2010) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Nina Zanjani

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Sandra Stojiljkovic is an actress, known for Hotel (2013), The Bridge (2011) and The Behemoth (2011).
biography.name: Sandra Stojiljkovic

biography.bio: Magnus Roosmann was born on June 11, 1963. He is an actor, known for Illusive Tracks (2003), Evil (2003) and Någon annanstans i Sverige (2011).
biography.name: Magnus Roosmann

biography.bio: Fredrik Dolk was born on December 14, 1961 as Fredrik Gustav Dolk. He is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011), When Tears Have Fallen (2014) and Zero Tolerance (1999).
biography.name: Fredrik Dolk

biography.bio: Baard Owe was born on July 3, 1936 in Mosjøen, Norway as Baard Arne Owe. He is an actor and director, known for O'Horten (2007), Headhunters (2011) and Gertrud (1964). He is married to Marie-Louise Coninck. They have four children.
biography.name: Baard Owe

biography.bio: Göran Graffman was born on February 12, 1931 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Eric Göran Graffman. He was an actor and director, known for You're Out of Your Mind, Maggie (1979), Madicken på Junibacken (1980) and Stora & små mirakel (1999). He was married to Monica Nordquist and Maj-Britt Lindholm. He died in November 2014 in Stockholm, Sweden.
biography.name: Göran Graffman

biography.bio: Christian Fiedler was born on August 1, 1940. He is an actor, known for Cops (2003), Sjätte dagen (1999) and Days Like This (2001).
biography.name: Christian Fiedler
